entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NE 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 12:08 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
